data.title: Relationships
data.text:
Lucy Bayliss (Julian Lennon)

Born in England to Robert Bayliss, as the middle child of three daughters and was raised in Majorca. She studied ballet and worked as a model. Lucy met Julian in 1994 in Barbados while with their respective partners. They started to date in 1997, Lucy quit her modeling career to help run Julian's record label, Music from Another Room, and his film productions, Pictures from Another Room. In 2005, her father was arrested for alleged sexual child abuse. By 2007, Julian and Lucy have broken up.

Beth Earl (Dhani Harrison)

Born in 1980 to Robert and Tricia Prior Earl. Her father is a restaurant entrepreneur (Planet Hollywood, Buca di Beppo Italian Restaurant, among others, including Hard Rock Cafe after Isaac Tigrett [stepfather of Zak, Jason, and Lee Starkey] sold his shares in 1988). In 2003, Beth opened her first venue, Rex Cinema & Bar, in London until it closed down when their lease ended in 2009. Beth and Dhani dated for several years until 2008.

Yuka Honda (Sean Lennon)

Yuka was born in Tokyo, Japan in December of 1960. She's the keyboardist for Cibo Matto and a music producer. Sean and Yuka met in 1996, becoming a couple and she produced his 'Into the Sun' album. They eventually broke up but remain good friends- they run a record label Chimera Music with Sean's girlfriend Charlotte Kemp Muhl. Yuka is now married to musician Nels Cline.

Bijou Lily Phillips (Sean Lennon)

Bijou was born on April 1, 1980 to John Phillips (from the Mamas and the Papas) and Geneviève Waïte; she's a model and actress. Sean and Bijou were together for four years before breaking up by 2003. Bijou is now married to actor Danny Masterson; she and Sean are friends.

Ollie Buckwell (Stella McCartney)

Dated Stella from 2000 to 2001; work as a record producer

Portia de Rossi (Francesca Gregorini)

An actress born as Amanda Rogers in Melbourne, Australia on January 31, 1973, becoming a model at the age of 11 and changed her name to Portia de Rossi at the age of 14. She made her acting debut in “Siren” in 1994 and then went successfully on TV with “Ally McBeal” and “Arrested Development”. Francesca and Portia became lovers in 2000, getting engaged in 2001 until 2004 when they broke up and is now married to TV host and comedian Ellen DeGeneres

Liliane Rudabet Gloria Elsveta Sobieski (Sean Lennon)

An actress born June 10, 1982 to Jean and Elizabeth Sobieski in New York City, New York, also growing up in France. Leelee started her career at age 10 and was seen as Sean’s escort to the 2004 Rock ‘n’ Roll Hall of Fame and a few dates afterwards.

Elizabeth Scarlett Jagger (Sean Lennon)

Elizabeth Jagger was born on March 2, 1984 to Mick Jagger and Jerry Hall in New York City. Keith Richards introduced Elizabeth and Sean and they started to date for a few months in 2004. Elizabeth is a model.

Mark Phillips 'Sparky' (Lee Starkey)

A musician from Demented Are Go

Robert Ian McNabb (Lee Starkey)

A musician born on November 3, 1962 in Liverpool, England who has performed with Ringo Starr and Zak Starkey. Dated Lee 2001 to 2003.

Unknown (James McCartney)

In the early 2000s, James had a girlfriend until they broke up when he started doing drugs again (James got heavily into drugs after Linda's death until he moved to Brighton) until early 2013 when he got sober.

Jade Nazareth (James McCartney)

Not much is known about the couple other than Jade was James's date for the month of February in 2012: she accompanied him at Paul McCartney's Hollywood Walk of Fame ceremony, MusiCares Person of the Year, and the Grammy Awards.
